alert.note: Alert for Graham; Macon; Northern Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:59AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Macon, west central Jackson, south central Swain and Graham Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 659 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Bryson City to 11 miles northwest of Murphy. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bryson City, Robbinsville, Town Of Santeetlah, Lake Santeetlah, Fontana Lake, Nantahala Lake, Smoky Mountains-Deep Creek, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome and Wesser. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
